```{r load-packages}
pacman::p_load(
  tidyverse, # Data wrangling
  here, # Folder management
  finalfit, # Labelling
  gtsummary, # Table summaries
  anthro, # Z-score estimation
  rio, # Import and export dataset
  janitor # Clean names
)
```

```{r load-dataset}
df <- import(here("data", "bono_project.csv"))
```

```{r glimpse-dataset}
glimpse(df)
```

```{r clean-names}
df <- clean_names(df)
```


```{r remove-metaid}
# Remove metadata
df <- df |> 
  select(-uuid)
```
